meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paul Holland Nancy Misener Alex Boisvert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4027.

td.p: Paul Holland, a Jesuit priest from Storrs, Connecticut
Nancy Misener, an auditor from Staten Island, New York
Alex Boisvert, a graduate student from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,801)

tr.td: OLD FAMILIAR PLACES
TEA-TOTALING
WORD ORIGINS
HISTORIC AMERICAN QUOTES
A DAY AT THE RACES
A NIGHT AT THE OPRAH

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'To find this city\'s Old Town, just follow the Rose Parade floats on Colorado Blvd.')

tr.td: To find this city's Old Town, just follow the Rose Parade floats on Colorado Blvd.
